dcterms:creator: S. Luz
F. Haider
D. Fromm
B. MacWhinney
dcterms:description: The ADReSS Challenge Dataset consists of a train and a test set, where the train set includes 78 AD and 78 non-AD patients, while the test set includes 24 AD and 24 non-AD ones. This dataset comprises speech recordings and their corresponding manual transcripts. Each participant describes the Cookie Theft picture from the Boston Diagnostic Aphasia Exam. The dataset minimizes the risks of biases in the prediction task, being matched for gender and age, and contains equal numbers of AD and non-AD patients. Recordings have been acoustically enhanced with stationary noise removal and audio volume normalization.
dcterms:title: ADReSS Challenge Dataset
